original_text:
Blown Away
Dalle profondità della terraferma arriva un gioco di slot che è sopravvissuto a un naufragio e ne esce vivo per offrire un’emozionante avventura su tre file e cinque bobine.
La Lightning Box è il provider di slot responsabile di questa release, che, come le sue precedenti slot online, è altrettanto coinvolgente e potenzialmente redditizia. Il tema della slot Blown Away ruota attorno all’equipaggio di un peschereccio guidato da un tricheco antropomorfo.
Le vittorie sono fatte con tre simboli dello stesso tipo che devono cadere sulla bobina più a sinistra ed estendersi verso destra. Ci sono 25 linee di pagamento sempre attive che possono portare a più di una vittoria.
Ci sono anche degli extra che possono aumentare le probabilità di vincita dei premi. Uno di questi simboli è il tricheco stesso, che è il selvaggio, e c’è il simbolo del fulmine (il logo della compagnia), che è la molla libera che innesca la dispersione.
Blown Away è una slot machine dall’aspetto divertente di Lightning Box, dove lo sviluppatore ha implementato un nuovo tema, che ruota attorno a personaggi animaleschi che vengono abbandonati su un’isola tropicale, il risultato di una tempesta in mare. Penso che avrebbero potuto fare certe cose meglio, ma questa slot include alcune buone caratteristiche, e nel complesso vale la pena di esaminarla.
Una grafica da sogno
Come nei giochi precedenti, come lo slot Respin Racer e Astro Cat, i giocatori vengono trattati con una grafica lussureggiante. Lightning Box come azienda ha uno stile riconoscibile nel modo in cui disegnano i simboli e il layout tutto intorno, e questo rende l’avventura della bobina piacevole dal punto di vista visivo.
I simboli nelle slot di Blown Away sono a dir poco fumettistici. C’è una lucertola scienziata, e una scimmia il cui volto mi sembra familiare, e un tricheco skipper che allude all’isola di Gilligan.
I risultati delle vittorie si ottengono con una band, cioè con monete d’oro che sgorgano da sotto il mulinello e durante l’avventura del mulinello ci sono note nautiche e suoni dell’oceano.
Non ci sono molte slot machine che useranno storie ispirate a Robinson Crusoe per i loro disegni, ma questo è quello che sembra stia facendo Blown Away. Piuttosto che avere i soliti umani come personaggi principali, si affidano ad animali e uccelli, uno diverso in ogni simbolo che ha un alto valore o caratteristica. I simboli di gioco di basso valore hanno ancora immagini reali, ma quelli migliori avranno foche, scimmie, pinguini, gabbiani e lucertole.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Il simbolo del tuono è lo scatter del gioco e cade sui rulli dispari (uno, tre e cinque). Questo simbolo fa scattare il bonus dei giri liberi che è di 10 giri che vengono con un kicker.
C’è un’alta probabilità che il simbolo del tornado cada sul mulinello. Se questo accade, il simbolo reale più basso sarà rimosso dal gioco.
Durante tutto il bonus i giocatori possono ottenere il metro di mucca in alto atterrando il simbolo del tornado. Ogni icona di mucca accesa è uguale a 1 volta il moltiplicatore. Inoltre ci sono dei moltiplicatori che possono calcolare le vincite con un fattore fino a 7 volte sulla scommessa.
Il Seal Wild è presente nel gioco, e si può usare questo per completare vari tipi di combinazioni regolari. Come sostituto, può essere posizionato accanto a qualsiasi simbolo regolare, e formerà una combo con esso.
Respins innescato da un tornado verrà attivato, quando il simbolo richiesto apparirà sui rulli. Il Tornado è un altro simbolo jolly, ma che si comporta in modo diverso. Appare solo sul rullo 5, e porta il Tornado Respin. Ad ogni respin che si attiva, un diverso valore basso Royal verrà rimosso dai rulli, a partire dai primi. Inizia con il 9, poi rimuove anche il 10 se c’è un Tornado in più che atterra, e può continuare così.
Inoltre, ci sono scatter di barche, che devono atterrare sulle bobine tre volte, tutto in un unico giro. Questo fa scattare 10 rotazioni libere e paga fino a 150 volte il pagamento. In questa modalità, avete la possibilità di raccogliere le Mucche atterrando i Tornado sui rulli, che a loro volta possono aumentare il moltiplicatore per le vostre vittorie fino a 7 volte. Il moltiplicatore può essere aumentato anche attraverso i simboli dei Tornado. Questi rimuoveranno anche un simbolo reale del valore più basso, ad ogni apparizione.
Hai la possibilità di scegliere una scommessa per il prossimo giro, e può essere a partire da €0,25, o fino a €200. La linea di scommessa sembra avere un intervallo da €0,01 a €8, e viene selezionata automaticamente, man mano che si modifica la scommessa totale. In entrambi i casi, il gioco ti dà 25 linee attive per ogni singolo giro.
Circa 900 volte la puntata è la più alta vincita che il gioco raggiungerà, quando si danno i premi al giocatore. Si tratta per lo più di una slot con una volatilità media, il che significa che ci saranno slot con la stessa quantità di rischio, ma con migliori vincite. Un RTP del 95,70% ci dice anche che c’è spazio per ricompense migliori.
Altre Slot Machine simili
I Giochi Lightning Box tendono ad offrire slot con un alto potenziale di vincita – Eagle Sun è raccomandato in quanto è possibile vincere fino a 56.000 volte le puntate su ogni giro gratis giocando con 80 linee di pagamento. Nel gioco base o nella funzione respin, è comunque possibile vincere fino a 28.000 volte le puntate.

raw_translation.response:
Blown Away
From the depths of the mainland comes a slot game that has survived a shipwreck and emerges alive to offer an exciting adventure on three rows and five reels.

The Lightning Box is the slot provider responsible for this release, which, like its previous online slots, is just as engaging and potentially lucrative. The theme of the Blown Away slot revolves around the crew of a fishing boat led by an anthropomorphic whale.

Wins are made with three symbols of the same type that must fall on the leftmost reel and extend to the right. There are 25 always active paylines that can lead to more than one win.

There are also extras that can increase the chances of winning prizes. One of these symbols is the whale itself, which is wild, and there is the lightning symbol (the company logo), which is the free spring that triggers the scatter.

Blown Away is a fun-looking slot machine from Lightning Box, where the developer has implemented a new theme, revolving around animal characters stranded on a tropical island, the result of a storm at sea. I think they could have done certain things better, but this slot includes some good features, and overall it is worth examining.

Dream graphics
As in previous games like Respin Racer and Astro Cat, players are treated to lush graphics. Lightning Box as a company has a recognizable style in the way they draw symbols and the layout all around, and this makes the reel adventure visually enjoyable.

The symbols in Blown Away slots are nothing short of comic book-like. There is a scientist lizard, and a monkey whose face seems familiar to me, and a skipper whale that alludes to Gilligan's island.

Winning results are achieved with a band, namely with gold coins that pour out from under the reel and during the reel adventure there are nautical notes and ocean sounds.

There are not many slot machines that will use Robinson Crusoe-inspired stories for their designs, but that's what Blown Away seems to be doing. Instead of having the usual humans as main characters, they rely on animals and birds, one different in each symbol that has a high value or feature. Low-value game symbols still have real images, but the better ones will have seals, monkeys, penguins, seagulls and lizards.

Functions and Symbols of the Slot Machine
The thunder symbol is the game's scatter and falls on odd reels (one, three, and five). This symbol triggers the 10 free spins bonus, which comes with a kicker.

There is a high chance that the tornado symbol will fall on the reel. If this happens, the lowest real symbol will be removed from the game.

Throughout the bonus, players can get the cow meter in the upper landing by landing the tornado symbol. Each cow icon lit is equal to 1 times the multiplier. There are also multipliers that can calculate winnings with a factor of up to 7 times the bet.

The Seal Wild is present in the game, and this can be used to complete various types of regular combinations. As a substitute, it can be placed next to any regular symbol, and it will form a combo with it.

Respins triggered by a tornado will be activated when the required symbol appears on the reels. The Tornado is another wild symbol, but it behaves differently. It only appears on reel 5, and brings the Tornado Respin. With each activated respin, a different low Royal value will be removed from the reels, starting from the first. It starts with 9, then removes 10 if there is an extra tornado landing, and so on.

Additionally, there are boat scatters, which must land on reels three times, all in one spin. This triggers 10 free spins and pays up to 150 times the payout. In this mode, you have the chance to collect Cows by landing Tornadoes on the reels, which in turn can increase the multiplier for your wins up to 7 times. The multiplier can also be increased by the Tornado symbols. These will also remove a real symbol of the lowest value, with each appearance.

You have the chance to choose a bet for the next spin, and it can be from €0.25, or up to €200. The betting line seems to have a range from €0.01 to €8 and is automatically selected as the total bet changes. In either case, the game gives you 25 active lines for each spin.

About 900 times the bet is the highest payout the game will give to the player. It is mostly a medium volatility slot, which means there will be slots with the same amount of risk, but with better payouts. An RTP of 95.70% also tells us that there is room for better rewards.

Other similar slot machines
Lightning Box games tend to offer slots with high winning potential - Eagle Sun is recommended as it is possible to win up to 56,000 times the bet on each free spin playing with 80 paylines. In the base game or in the respin feature, it is still possible to win up to 28,000 times the bets.

Blown Away
From the depths of the mainland comes a slot game that has survived a shipwreck and emerges alive to offer an exciting adventure on three rows and five reels.

The Lightning Box is the slot provider responsible for this release, which, like its previous online slots, is just as engaging and potentially lucrative. The theme of the Blown Away slot revolves around the crew of a fishing boat led by an anthropomorphic whale.

Wins are made with three symbols of the same type that must fall on the leftmost reel and extend to the right. There are 25 always active paylines that can lead to more than one win.

There are also extras that can increase the chances of winning prizes. One of these symbols is the whale itself, which is wild, and there is the lightning symbol (the company logo), which is the free spring that triggers the scatter.

Blown Away is a fun-looking slot machine from Lightning Box, where the developer has implemented a new theme, revolving around animal characters stranded on a tropical island, the result of a storm at sea. I think they could have done certain things better, but this slot includes some good features, and overall it is worth examining.

Dream graphics
As in previous games like Respin Racer and Astro Cat, players are treated to lush graphics. Lightning Box as a company has a recognizable style in the way they draw symbols and the layout all around, and this makes the reel adventure visually enjoyable.

The symbols in Blown Away slots are nothing short of comic book-like. There is a scientist lizard, and a monkey whose face seems familiar to me, and a skipper whale that alludes to Gilligan's island.

Winning results are achieved with a band, namely with gold coins that pour out from under the reel and during the reel adventure there are nautical notes and ocean sounds.

There are not many slot machines that will use Robinson Crusoe-inspired stories for their designs, but that's what Blown Away seems to be doing. Instead of having the usual humans as main characters, they rely on animals and birds, one different in each symbol that has a high value or feature. Low-value game symbols still have real images, but the better ones will have seals, monkeys, penguins, seagulls and lizards.

Functions and Symbols of the Slot Machine
The thunder symbol is the game's scatter and falls on odd reels (one, three, and five). This symbol triggers the 10 free spins bonus, which comes with a kicker.

There is a high chance that the tornado symbol will fall on the reel. If this happens, the lowest real symbol will be removed from the game.

Throughout the bonus, players can get the cow meter in the upper landing by landing the tornado symbol. Each cow icon lit is equal to 1 times the multiplier. There are also multipliers that can calculate winnings with a factor of up to 7 times the bet.

The Seal Wild is present in the game, and this can be used to complete various types of regular combinations. As a substitute, it can be placed next to any regular symbol, and it will form a combo with it.

Respins triggered by a tornado will be activated when the required symbol appears on the reels. The Tornado is another wild symbol, but it behaves differently. It only appears on reel 5, and brings the Tornado Respin. With each activated respin, a different low Royal value will be removed from the reels, starting from the first. It starts with 9, then removes 10 if there is an extra tornado landing, and so on.

Additionally, there are boat scatters, which must land on reels three times, all in one spin. This triggers 10 free spins and pays up to 150 times the payout. In this mode, you have the chance to collect Cows by landing Tornadoes on the reels, which in turn can increase the multiplier for your wins up to 7 times. The multiplier can also be increased by the Tornado symbols. These will also remove a real symbol of the lowest value, with each appearance.

You have the chance to choose a bet for the next spin, and it can be from €0.25, or up to €200. The betting line seems to have a range from €0.01 to €8 and is automatically selected as the total bet changes. In either case, the game gives you 25 active lines for each spin.

About 900 times the bet is the highest payout the game will give to the player. It is mostly a medium volatility slot, which means there will be slots with the same amount of risk, but with better payouts. An RTP of 95.70% also tells us that there is room for better rewards.

Other similar slot machines
Lightning Box games tend to offer slots with high winning potential - Eagle Sun is recommended as it is possible to win up to 56,000 times the bet on each free spin playing with 80 paylines. In the base game or in the respin feature, it is still possible to win up to 28,000 times the bets.

Review:
 
Gameplay

Blown Away is an engaging slot game with an animal-inspired theme that revolves around the crew of a fishing boat led by an anthropomorphic whale. Wins are made with three symbols of the same type that must fall on the leftmost reel and extend to the right. There are 25 always active paylines that can lead to more than one win. There are also extras that can increase the chances of winning prizes, such as the whale symbol, which is wild, and the lightning symbol, which is the free spin that triggers the scatter.

Theme

Blown Away has a unique theme revolving around animal characters stranded on a tropical island, resulting from a storm at sea. The symbol designs are comic book-like, featuring a scientist lizard, monkey, skipper whale, and more. The game's design is visually enjoyable and has a recognizable style that Lightning Box is known for.

Paylines

Blown Away features 25 always active paylines extending from the leftmost reel to the right. These paylines can lead to multiple wins, making the game even more exciting.

Winning Potential

Blown Away has a maximum payout of about 900 times the bet, making it a medium volatility slot. There are other Lightning Box games that offer higher winning potential, such as Eagle Sun, which can pay up to 56,000 times the bet on each free spin playing with 80 paylines. However, Blown Away still offers a decent winning potential for players.

Bonuses

Blown Away offers various bonuses to increase the chances of winning prizes. The thunder symbol is the game's scatter, and it triggers the 10 free spins bonus, which comes with a kicker. There is also a high chance that the tornado symbol will fall on the reel, which removes the lowest real symbol from the game. Moreover, players can collect Cows in the bonus mode and increase the multiplier up to 7 times by landing Tornadoes on the reels. The Seal Wild can be used to complete various types of regular combinations and can be placed next to any regular symbol to form a combo.

Volatility

Blown Away is a medium volatility slot, which means there will be slots with the same amount of risk but with better payouts. The game's RTP of 95.70% also tells us that there is room for better rewards.

RTP

Blown Away has an RTP of 95.70%, which is slightly lower than the industry average. However, this is still a decent RTP that provides players with a chance to win decent rewards.

Graphics

Blown Away has dream graphics, featuring lush and comic book-like designs that give the game a unique and enjoyable visual style. The game layout is impressive, and it includes nautical notes and ocean sounds that make the experience more immersive. Overall, the game provides players with an engaging, visually appealing, and entertaining slot experience.

Review:
 
Blown Away Gameplay

Blown Away is a slot game with a theme based on a crew of a fishing boat led by an anthropomorphic whale. It's a video slot with three rows and five reels, and players use 25 always active paylines that can lead to more than one win.

Animal-themed slots

Blown Away offers a unique animal-themed slot revolving around animal characters stranded on a tropical island, the result of a storm at sea. Instead of using humans as main characters, the game relies on animals and birds, one different in each symbol that has a high value or feature.

Paylines and winning combinations

To create a winning combination in Blown Away, you must have three symbols of the same type on the leftmost reel that extend to the right. You can achieve multiple winning results with a band, namely with gold coins that pour out from under the reel.

Wild and scatter symbols

Blown Away has three types of wild symbols: The Whale is wild, and the Seal Wild can be used to complete various regular combinations. The Tornado is another wild symbol, but it behaves differently. The thunder symbol is a scatter symbol and triggers the 10 free spins bonus which comes with a kicker. There are also boat scatters, which triggers 10 free spins and pays up to 150 times the payout.

Bonus rounds and free spins

Blown Away offers different bonus rounds and free spins. Respins triggered by a tornado will be activated when the required symbol appears on the reels. With each activated respin, a different low Royal value will be removed from the reels. Additionally, players can get the cow meter in the upper landing by landing the tornado symbol. Each cow icon lit is equal to 1 times the multiplier. The multiplier level can be increased up to 7 times the bet, which also removes a real symbol of the lowest value with each tornado symbol appearance.

Volatility and RTP

Blown Away is considered a medium volatility slot game with an RTP of 95.70%, which means there is room for better rewards. Other similar slot machines in the Lightning Box games tend to offer slots with high winning potential like Eagle Sun, which can pay up to 56,000 times the bet on each free spin playing with 80 paylines. In the base game or in the respin feature, it is still possible to win up to 28,000 times the bets.

Graphics and design

Blown Away, as with other games from Lightning Box, has excellent graphics. Players are treated to lush visuals, and the symbols in the game are comic book-like and memorable. There is no shortage of attention to details in the reel adventure, and nautical notes and ocean sounds add an extra layer of immersion.

Payout and jackpots

The highest payout available in Blown Away is about 900 times the bet. Players can bet a minimum of €0.25 and a maximum of €200.

Review: Blown Away
From the depths of the mainland comes a slot game that has survived a shipwreck and emerges alive to offer an exciting adventure on three rows and five reels.

The Lightning Box is the slot provider responsible for this release, which, like its previous online slots, is just as engaging and potentially lucrative. The theme of the Blown Away slot revolves around the crew of a fishing boat led by an anthropomorphic whale.

Wins are made with three symbols of the same type that must fall on the leftmost reel and extend to the right. There are 25 always active paylines that can lead to more than one win.

There are also extras that can increase the chances of winning prizes. One of these symbols is the whale itself, which is wild, and there is the lightning symbol (the company logo), which is the free spring that triggers the scatter.

Blown Away is a fun-looking slot machine from Lightning Box, where the developer has implemented a new theme, revolving around animal characters stranded on a tropical island, the result of a storm at sea. I think they could have done certain things better, but this slot includes some good features, and overall it is worth examining.

Dream graphics
As in previous games like Respin Racer and Astro Cat, players are treated to lush graphics. Lightning Box as a company has a recognizable style in the way they draw symbols and the layout all around, and this makes the reel adventure visually enjoyable.

The symbols in Blown Away slots are nothing short of comic book-like. There is a scientist lizard, and a monkey whose face seems familiar to me, and a skipper whale that alludes to Gilligan's island.

Winning results are achieved with a band, namely with gold coins that pour out from under the reel and during the reel adventure there are nautical notes and ocean sounds.

There are not many slot machines that will use Robinson Crusoe-inspired stories for their designs, but that's what Blown Away seems to be doing. Instead of having the usual humans as main characters, they rely on animals and birds, one different in each symbol that has a high value or feature. Low-value game symbols still have real images, but the better ones will have seals, monkeys, penguins, seagulls and lizards.

Functions and Symbols of the Slot Machine
The thunder symbol is the game's scatter and falls on odd reels (one, three, and five). This symbol triggers the 10 free spins bonus, which comes with a kicker.

There is a high chance that the tornado symbol will fall on the reel. If this happens, the lowest real symbol will be removed from the game.

Throughout the bonus, players can get the cow meter in the upper landing by landing the tornado symbol. Each cow icon lit is equal to 1 times the multiplier. There are also multipliers that can calculate winnings with a factor of up to 7 times the bet.

The Seal Wild is present in the game, and this can be used to complete various types of regular combinations. As a substitute, it can be placed next to any regular symbol, and it will form a combo with it.

Respins triggered by a tornado will be activated when the required symbol appears on the reels. The Tornado is another wild symbol, but it behaves differently. It only appears on reel 5, and brings the Tornado Respin. With each activated respin, a different low Royal value will be removed from the reels, starting from the first. It starts with 9, then removes 10 if there is an extra tornado landing, and so on.

Additionally, there are boat scatters, which must land on reels three times, all in one spin. This triggers 10 free spins and pays up to 150 times the payout. In this mode, you have the chance to collect Cows by landing Tornadoes on the reels, which in turn can increase the multiplier for your wins up to 7 times. The multiplier can also be increased by the Tornado symbols. These will also remove a real symbol of the lowest value, with each appearance.

You have the chance to choose a bet for the next spin, and it can be from €0.25, or up to €200. The betting line seems to have a range from €0.01 to €8 and is automatically selected as the total bet changes. In either case, the game gives you 25 active lines for each spin.

About 900 times the bet is the highest payout the game will give to the player. It is mostly a medium volatility slot, which means there will be slots with the same amount of risk, but with better payouts. An RTP of 95.70% also tells us that there is room for better rewards.

Other similar slot machines
Lightning Box games tend to offer slots with high winning potential - Eagle Sun is recommended as it is possible to win up to 56,000 times the bet on each free spin playing with 80 paylines. In the base game or in the respin feature, it is still possible to win up to 28,000 times the bets.
